title: Community Meeting
content: Join us for our monthly community meeting on 15 May 2024 at 7 PM in the Community Hall.

title: Pool Maintenance
content: The swimming pool will be closed for maintenance from 20 May 2024 to 22 May 2024. We apologize for any inconvenience.

title: New Recycling Program
content: Starting 1 June 2024, we're implementing a new recycling program. Please check your email for details on proper waste segregation.
